Reviews.Title: “Proper hotel, very good breakfast, the best location”

Reviews.Content: happy hotel choice choosing hotel focus lies cleanness check bathroom sheets accepting hotel comfortable proper clean personnel helpful breakfast nice loved turkish bread location perfect city trip nearby foot recommend

Reviews.Title: “Great Value”

Reviews.Content: positives clean free wifi soap sewing kit slippers shoe shine hairdryer location walking distance grand bazaar blue mosque etc tram stop provides access major attractions breakfast included cute seats restaurant cons smelt fresh paint theyve painted heaters smell intensified left window following day smell little double bed wall lobby

Reviews.Title: “Excellent value”
Reviews.Author: JaNar
Reviews.Content: pleasant nice warm hotel located historical istanbul called beyazit istanbul lot hotel impressed price clean tidy hospitality hotel staff location close major touristic attractions 10 min sultanahmet 2 stops tramway close hotel lots restaurants outside selection turkish food burger king 2 blocks breakfast dont expect rich variety food decorated clean tidy especially bathroom clean plus definitely book hotel trip istanbul

Reviews.Title: “Great hotel with wonderful location and superb staff!”
Reviews.Author: Dana M
Reviews.Content: am russia stayed hotel january hotel conquered location incredibly helpful staff excellent price staff extremely friendly requests realized pleasure quality fast arrival departure literally excellent wifi signal hotel quiet cozy cleaned daily time soaps shampoos nearby tram station lot shops leather gold walking distance grand bazaar istanbuls majority sights 20 minutes walking distance time hotel

Reviews.Title: “Cosy hotel, warm people, excellent location!”
Reviews.Author: Melanie C
Reviews.Content: hi guys stayed hotel boyfriend week hard affordable cosy stay istanbul enter lobby charm anyway youll love turkish breakfast location excellent easily reach grand bazaar blue mosque walk wonderful lot istanbul price reasonable standarts clean especially linens toilets am looking hotel cosy warm atmosphere hospitality transport service airport hotel useful consider taxi costs distance stayed nights definitely choose hotel visit

Reviews.Title: “cosy hotel in a cosy cute cuty :)”
Reviews.Author: moosh31
Reviews.Content: dad stayed 2 times stay weekend location 20 mins walk blue lively buzzy soon hotel hospitality amazing helpful bless

Reviews.Title: “Worst and dirtiest hotel ever!!!”

Reviews.Content: stay worst dirtiest hotel stayed checkin floor dirty dust miserable mouldy bathroom tiny double bed close wall move bathroom complained stay 3 nights clean housekeeping changed towels daily poor cold breakfast simply disgusting location â€“ near grand bazaar tram station hotel terrible please avoid

Reviews.Title: “Would not recommend this hotel”
Reviews.Author: Palmc
Reviews.Content: double bed wall bathroom nearly bedroom designed drawer space clothes fridge didnt liked teacoffee facilities bedroom breakfast cereal cold meats cheese plus situation hotel 23 minutes grand bazaar 23 minutes blue mosque hagia sofya trams easy access cheap suggest map arrive hotel information neither tourist office offered map

Reviews.Title: “Excellent location and great service”
Reviews.Author: mooz110
Reviews.Content: november 2010 stayed 3 nights clean hotel wonderful stay condition hot water 24hrs nice breakfast morningi return liked location 3 mins walk grand bazaar covered shopping tram stop 2 mins walk hotel entrance

Reviews.Content: spent time hotel couldnt imagine home cozy pure personnel attentive smile mood day breakfasts european fresh meal fruit attempt seafood shrimps calamari reception told wait 5 minutes arrived car brought magnificent fish restaurant kumkapi hotel brought hotel super didnt assume service hotel drink fresh juice foot reach sight blue mosque grand bazar etc near hotel tram stop day walk bosporus 10 minutes transfer hotel quickly time advise hotel thank staff olga respect

Reviews.Content: stayed hotel 1 week 2002 weekend 2004 times locations possibily located european city close grand bazaar 10 minutes avery short lovely walk spice bazaar close tram station surrounded nice shops people reception help money exchange giving directions recommandations regarding buy various restaurants etc booking weekend ps heard newly renovated im looking forward

Reviews.Title: “FIne, just fine.”

Reviews.Content: time ist time round friends planned stay taksim crazy busy stupidly expensive found reading reviews ta decided book location middle tram stops short walk grand bazaar major sites sultanahmet hotel refurbishment sized double bathroom door blocked toliet shower main light bathroom warmth character wouldnt spend time hotel clean bed comfortable complaints free wifi flat screen tvs breakfast typically turkish adequate particularly recommend friends stay didnt time search else

Reviews.Title: “Very good hotel with a very good price!”
Reviews.Author: Galyna_S
Reviews.Content: found hotel due tripadvisor recognize absolutely nice call themselves home home true polite attentive stuff clean cozy location add description meal breakfast possibility restful sleep satisfied understanding hospitality mean highly recommend level comfort reasonable price memories trip strictly connected stayed experience hotel filled memories pleasure

Reviews.Title: “Excellent location, helpful, friendly staff, clean, and good breakfast.”
Reviews.Author: ehore
Reviews.Content: wife stayed 4 nights hotel istanbul comfortable complaints received service staff able walk tourist venues mosques grande bazaar etc hesitation recommending hotel budget conscious travellers

Reviews.Title: “good hotel in best location and moderate prices!”
Reviews.Author: Dorinel_10
Reviews.Content: nice family owned hotel competent friendly ready help customer location excelent minutes foot aya ahmet mosque grand save lot money coming hotel metro tram ataturk airport

Reviews.Title: “Good budget hotel - fantastic location”
Reviews.Author: LondonLovestravel
Reviews.Content: ideal hotel city break stayed 5 nights found location perfect exploring istanbul basic clean tv actually breakfast consisted mainly nice bread unless youre keen turkish style breakfast olives meat salad encountered shower didnt drain reported wasnt fixed suspect language barrier staff friendly genuinely didnt understand broken staying short time didnt bother pushing honestly recommend hotel friends clean base explore slightly picky ones people happy spend money

Reviews.Title: “One of the worst hotel experience!!!”
Reviews.Author: mike39kz
Reviews.Content: 20 times istambul met bad service bad hotel day 34 persons reception bored serve complains manager speak unexperienced personel breakfast poor luggage leave luggage lobby 6 sq meters stayed 15 hour 12 oclock 10 usd agreed check 25 euro started shout speak nice call police left leave called police spent hundreds nights hotels world met bad hotel avoid

Reviews.Title: “Excellent hotel in great location”
Reviews.Author: Rocky017
Reviews.Content: 8am able check straight check day noon buffet breakfast 1 turkey adds value stay clean tv ac peaceful easy walk grand bazaar sultanahmet trams journeys

Reviews.Title: “PERFECT LOCATION, but be prepared for the basic rooms”
Reviews.Author: Avidtraveler25_9
Reviews.Content: definitely recommend hotel istanbul budget friend paid 40 night 20 stay service clean free breakfast added bonus amazing walking distance major historical sites minutes 10 lira cab ride taksim square europe staff friendly basic beds tv sight seeing sleep quiet night easy night sleep safe location

Reviews.Title: “Cheap but bare bones”
Reviews.Author: Heather025
Reviews.Content: staff nice clean truly simple hotel stay charming hotels near famous monuments 15 euros plus airport dropoff service taxi tried lunch taking airport

Reviews.Title: “Avoid! Booked the hotel, but didnt get the chance to stay”

Reviews.Content: arrived informed receptionist smile cancel reservation announcing manager friends coming sort didnt understand girl reception doesnt speak english nice treat guest

Reviews.Title: “Clean, cute hotel that's reasonably priced in a great location!”
Reviews.Author: Bibsicle123
Reviews.Content: arrived hotel morning checked straight wait reception warned tiny move guests checked bigger advised wouldnt solo traveler nice offer regardless breakfast variety breads cheeses spreads cucumbers tomatoes sweets etc coffee standard american style turkish coffee staff willing assist clean bathroom newly renovated window view directly alley building view barely spent time didnt mind location middle town reasonably priced hotel location staff nice
